column12: '>Theopen toe Fila Pavo sports sandals comprises of a midfoot and backfootstrap that is done with Velcro closure. The diagonal midfootstrap printed synthetic upper and forefront strap adds to its casual look.The textured footbed and the rubber outsole with grooves are a perfectblend of comfort and style.

Care Tips
